extendedInfo.description: ## Msg Sniffer can now steal harder, screw harder and stay calmer.. !!Check out the new updates.. (Long Press the 'Author' name to reveal Msg Sniffer's UI).Want to spy on your friend or take a revenge on someone ?? Here is a chance !Put this app in their phone and it will forward you all the sms they receive. May it be a stupid advertisement sms or a lovely message from his/her fiancee... This app can screw their phone bill or exhaust their sms benefits..Happy spying !HOW TO USE :*  Install the app on the phone whom you want to monitor. (not on your phone)*  Enter YOUR mobile no. into the app.(by long pressing the person's name who said the quote) *  It will start forwarding you the messages. (Need not send any start or stop now).*  Later if you want to stop monitoring, just send him a ''stop'' message to stop and ''start'' to start monitoring.Features :* Forwarded messages cannot be spotted in the 'sent' items of the default messaging app. * None of the message counter app can track/count the messages sent via this app. * Absolutely no ads. ##Note:It forwards only the most recently 'sent' or 'received' messages. The app gets triggered only on receiving a SMS.. To stop from forwarding after installation, give an empty mobile number and press "Done".Keywords : msg, sms, message, spy, steal, monitor, sniff, track.

reviews.title: Ehhhh....
reviews.comment: What is so stealth about this app? Appears in markets installed list, worse of all the name shows as \"message sniffer\"! The apps icon is listed with every other app on device. Might want to create a hidden icon/widget and change some other locations where it shows up.  To the people saying it doesn\'t work, DO NOT ATTEMPT any method of espionage such as this, because you clearly don\'t read instructions & rush thru important details making it likely u will fail any attempt to spy. Good luck :P
